00053 /* render_preview.c */
00054 
00055 /* stores rendered preview  - is also used for icons */
00056 typedef struct RenderInfo {
00057     int pr_rectx;
00058     int pr_recty;
00059     short curtile, tottile, status;
00060     rcti disprect;          /* storage for view3d preview rect */
00061     unsigned int* rect;     
00062     struct Render *re;      /* persistent render */
00063 } RenderInfo;
00064 
00065 /* ri->status */
00066 #define PR_DBASE            1
00067 #define PR_DISPRECT         2
00068 #define PR_PROJECTED        4
00069 #define PR_ROTATED          8
00070 
00071 /* Render the preview
00072  *
00073  * pr_method:
00074  * - PR_BUTS_RENDER: preview is rendered for buttons window
00075  * - PR_ICON_RENDER: preview is rendered for icons. hopefully fast enough for at least 32x32
00076  * - PR_NODE_RENDER: preview is rendered for node editor
00077  */
00078 
00079 #define PR_BUTS_RENDER  0
00080 #define PR_ICON_RENDER  1
00081 #define PR_NODE_RENDER  2
00082 
00083 void ED_preview_init_dbase(void);
00084 void ED_preview_free_dbase(void);

00087 void ED_preview_icon_job(const struct bContext *C, void *owner, struct ID *id, unsigned int *rect, int sizex, int sizey);
00088 void ED_preview_kill_jobs(const struct bContext *C);
